quote: This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue pill - the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes.
title: The Matrix

quote: Throughout human history, we have been dependent on machines to survive. Fate, it seems, is not without a sense of irony
title: The Matrix

quote: If real is what you can feel, smell, taste and see, then 'real' is simply electrical signals interpreted by your brain.
title: The Matrix

quote: Have you ever had a dream, Neo, that you seemed so sure it was real? But if were unable to wake up from that dream, how would you tell the difference between the dream world & the real world?
title: The Matrix
